list_definition.definition: (of people) with little or no hair on the head

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is going bald (= becoming bald).

list_definition.definition: (of birds, animals) without feathers, fur etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There was a bald patch on the dog’s back.
